title: Caddy Web Server Dashboard
description: Complete production monitoring for Caddy reverse proxy: upstream health, resource utilization, Go runtime, and system info.

panels.title: Config Reload Status
panels.description: Last config reload status. 1 = success (green), 0 = failed (red).

panels.title: Healthy Upstreams
panels.description: Total healthy reverse proxy backends. Critical for production.

panels.title: Unhealthy Upstreams
panels.description: Backends marked unhealthy. Non-zero = ALERT!

panels.title: Total Upstreams
panels.description: Total configured upstream backends.

panels.title: Upstream Health %
panels.description: Percentage of healthy upstreams. Target: 100%.

panels.title: Process Uptime
panels.description: How long Caddy has been running. Displayed as days:hours:minutes:seconds.

panels.title: Upstream Health by Backend
panels.description: Health status per upstream. 1 = healthy, 0 = down.

panels.title: Admin API Requests
panels.description: Rate of requests to Caddy Admin API by path and status code.

panels.title: CPU Usage
panels.description: CPU cores consumed. 1.0 = 100% of one core.

panels.title: CPU Usage %
panels.description: CPU as percentage (depends on core count scaling).

panels.title: Resident Memory (RSS)
panels.description: Physical memory used. Primary memory indicator.

panels.title: Virtual Memory
panels.description: Total virtual memory. Includes mapped files.

panels.title: Heap Memory Usage
panels.description: Go heap: allocated vs system obtained.

panels.title: Total Memory Obtained
panels.description: Total memory obtained from OS.

panels.title: Open File Descriptors
panels.description: Currently open FDs. Watch for approaching max.

panels.title: Max File Descriptors
panels.description: System limit for open FDs.

panels.title: FD Utilization %
panels.description: Percentage of FD limit used. Alert if > 80%.

panels.title: Goroutines
panels.description: Running goroutines. Sudden increases = potential leak.

panels.title: OS Threads
panels.description: OS threads spawned by Go runtime.

panels.title: GC Pause Duration (P50)
panels.description: Median GC pause. Should be < 1ms.

panels.title: GC Pause Duration (P99)
panels.description: Worst-case GC pause. Alert if > 10ms.

panels.title: GC Cycles
panels.description: Number of completed GC cycles.

panels.title: Heap Objects
panels.description: Number of allocated heap objects.

panels.title: Memory Allocation Rate
panels.description: Bytes allocated per second.

panels.title: Heap Idle vs In Use
panels.description: Heap memory breakdown.

panels.title: Stack Memory
panels.description: Memory used by goroutine stacks.

panels.title: Next GC Target
panels.description: Heap size that triggers next GC.

panels.title: Caddy Version
panels.description: Build info including version and path.

panels.title: Go Version
panels.description: Go runtime version used to build Caddy.

panels.title: Config Reload Timestamp
panels.description: When config was last reloaded.

panels.title: Memory Frees Rate
panels.description: Rate of memory deallocations.

panels.title: Memory Mallocs Rate
panels.description: Rate of memory allocations.

panels.title: Promhttp Requests in Flight
panels.description: Current metric scrape requests.
